titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the use of grant amounts awarded under the Veterans Cemetery Grants Program for construction of fully enclosed committal service shelters in certain State veterans' cemeteries, and for other purposes.
Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019
Department of Veterans Affairs Committal Service Shelter Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
